Job Title: Production Supervisor

Location: Rockwall, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
At Mattr, we have built a true team environment where all employees are empowered to contribute to the success of the company. We want you to join our team! We offer year-round, full-time permanent work, paid overtime, medical and dental benefits, competitive wages, safety boot allowance, bonus programs, and staff social events. All this at a single location where we provide the tools, PPE, and safety training needed for the job.

POSITION SUMMARY:

Responsible for safe and efficient operations of a plant operation including the quality and efficiency of product produced. This position is to lead a production shift of Lead Operators, and Production Operators to ensure product is being produced to specifications, in a safe manner while meeting quality and safety targets.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

People Management

Manages a diverse team including Lead Operators and Operators to meet business objectivesCreates a culture of accountable performance through collaboration in a fun and safe environmentCommunicate important information and regular updates to team at daily DMP meetings, bi-weekly town hall meetings and one on one follow upEnsures effective employee relations by providing employee coaching and development. Manages employee issues through conflict resolutionMakes employment decisions that include hiring, disciplinary actions and terminations Manages plant priorities and performance measures. Provides regular progress to managerManages Time & Attendance by verifying that the proper time is entered each pay period, approving and signing off timecards for all production staff on teamPreparing and submitting documentation for operator promotionsManages the Lead Operators and operations of the manufacturing floor to ensure job orders and all corresponding paperwork are completed in accordance with the production scheduleComplete and deliver performance evaluations and provide input regarding compensationConducts monthly meeting with Lead operators to go over monthly goals and areas of focus based on production demands, KPI’s and organizational needs 

Operations Management

Manages production through understanding of procedures, processes, equipment and productBalances and reports quality, productivity, costs, safety and morale to achieve positive results in all areas. Works to improve in all areas. Maintain a good working relationship with fellow Managers, Q.C. and outside inspection personnel to ensure a continuous flow of expected productivity. Responsible for monthly MPR slide to communicate team metricsEnsure accurate and complete collection of production documentation and dataConduct daily DMP meetings and weekly ‘tool box’ meetingsGenerate Purchase Requisitions for any needed tools or consumable items for production not covered by the Kanban systemEnroll employees in extra training programs both in house and external 

HSE

Administer Company Incident and Injury Free (IIF) safety program Promote safe working habits and maintain good housekeeping 5S to ensure a safe and clean working environment for all employees. Participate in the Joint Health & Safety CommitteeConduct Active Safety Acknowledgment conversations with employees to spread safety messageConduct safety investigations for incidents that occur under supervised areaAssign and complete corrective actions as they are generated from Workplace inspections, safety incidents, or any other reporting system. Review incidents with team members at DMPHelp facilitate the safety cornerTrain employees on use of incident reporting database

Quality Control and Continuous Improvement

Manages employees by checking product to maintain a high standard of quality and quantity. Ensure compliance of technical procedures. Promote, manage, and actively participate in the implementation of ShawCor Manufacturing System (SMS) programs. Responsible for the development and implementation of SOP and HAA’s throughout the manufacturing facilityHelp facilitate and carry out manufacturing trials for development of new products or improvements of current productsInvolved in VSM’s, FMEA’s, Fishbone diagrams as they relate to production Troubleshoot production issues as they arise and assist multiple departmentsLead improvement projects with team members 

Maintenance

Ensure the equipment is in safe and efficient condition to produce expected quality and quantity of product. Responsible for the purchase of spare parts and production supplies/consumable for minimum downtime and production. Maintenance requests and follow up

Knowledge And Skills Required

 3-5 years of experience in manufacturing Associates degree or post-secondary diploma is an asset however experience is valued above education.  The incumbent must have specialized knowledge of various manufacturing processes Must have in depth understanding of the relationships between quality and the production variables Must have comprehensive understanding of equipment maintenance requirements Proven ability to lead people and get results through others Strong interpersonal and communications skills

Applications will be accepted until the position is filled. We thank all applicants for their interest, but only those selected for an interview will be contacted. All recruiting activities are managed via our applicant tracking system. Please apply online to be considered for this opportunity.

Mattr is an equal opportunity employer.

#MattrCS

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
